entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
